span_48: HCA Florida Healthcare/USF Morsani College of Medicine GME Largo Hospital Program
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_78: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_96: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_99: Our program offers unique surgical and cosmetic training with robust clinical and didactic content. Residents get elective rotation opportunities every year throughout training. We also have a terrific board preparation program that begins in the first weeks of residency. Our program offers linked Transitional Year/Dermatology positions: TY in 2023-2024 followed by Dermatology in the 2024-2025 academic year. NRMP codes for both are listed. Applications accepted on ERAS.
